idea-plugin.name: HighlightWithRules
idea-plugin.description:
HighlightWithRules enables customizable JSON highlighting through user-defined rules, simplifying the visualization of structured data. It supports matching keys, values, and applying tailored styles to highlight meaningful content patterns.
  • Define rules using JSON: match specific keys or values and assign highlight colors or styles.
  • Enable context-aware highlighting to emphasize custom structures or flags in data.
  • Future support planned for additional markup and programming languages.

Enhance readability and clarity in complex JSON files with precise visual cues.
